item.title: IRFC The Railway Stock That Just Got a Major Upgrade - What It Means for Investors
item.description:
If you’ve been watching the markets, you might have noticed IRFC’s shares climbing steadily for four straight sessions, jumping over 11% to close at â‚¹123.70 on Friday. I’m going to break down what’s happening with this railway PSU and why it might be worth a spot in your portfolio.

What’s the Big News? #

The biggest catalyst for IRFC’s recent rally is simple: the Government of India just gave the company “Navratna” status. Until now, IRFC was only a “Mini-Ratna” company, but this upgrade is a big deal!
